thread.title: Ex-soldier upset by no jail time recommendation for Bergdahl

title: Ex-soldier upset by no jail time recommendation for Bergdahl
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
A former member of Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl's platoon says he's angered by an Army officer's recommendation that Bergdahl face a lower-level court...
